description:
Specifically designed for your precious Toshiba Thrive 10.1-Inch Android Tablet, this MoKo case features a combination of functionality and style. Premium PU leather boosts a classy look; no-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection; access to all controls and features; folding cover transforms the case to be a stand with two angles: perfect whenever you type an email or watch a movie. Well built to protect your Toshiba Thrive for the years to come. Limited Lifetime warranty. Your satisfaction is guaranteed.


NOTE: 
This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products and superb customer service.

title: MoKo(TM) Folding Cover Case With Stand for Toshiba Thrive 10.1-Inch Android Tablet (Black)
